thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com | 24 of 1307
thread.title: Jason
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Jason

author: Jason
title: Jason
text:
Bought set of four snows. They were special order, which meant a three day wait but so what? No big deal. Most important
1. Tires were waiting for me on the date/time of appt
2. They took my car IMMEDIATELY
3. Car was ready within the hour - when THEY SAID it would be ready.
Thanks, see you next time.
